import React from 'react'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Carousel, Container, Toast } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './Style.css'; import Resume from './../img/pallotta_resume.pdf'; function ContentContainer({ navSelected }) { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const [showToast, setShowToast] = useState(false); const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); } useEffect(() => { var divContainer = document.getElementById("content_container"); var divs = divContainer.getElementsByClassName("contentDivs"); var carouselDescriptionsContainer = document.getElementById("carousel-descriptions"); var carouselDescriptions = carouselDescriptionsContainer.getElementsByTagName("div"); for (let item of divs) { if (item.dataset.item !== navSelected) { item.classList.add("hiddenDivs"); } else { item.classList.remove("hiddenDivs"); item.style.color = "red" } } for (let description of carouselDescriptions) { if (parseInt(description.dataset.index) !== index) { description.classList.add("hiddenDivs"); } else { description.classList.remove("hiddenDivs"); } } }); return (
homepage
about me

My Education

Completed three years of high school at the Liceo Scientifico A. Romita, Campobasso, Italy.

Graduated from Bishop Grimes Jr./Sr. High School in Syracuse, NY.

3rd Year Student at the Rochester Institute of Technology, class of 2022.

Pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Web and Mobile Computing and a minor in Computer Security.

Received the RIT's Founder Scholarship for Internation Students.

Awarded the B. Thomas Golisano College of Computing and Information Sciences Dean's List (Fall 2018, Spring 2019, Fall 2019, Spring 2020).

Resume

My Work

Tapaut

Event Finder Mobile Application

Wellness Manager

Desktop Application for managing nutrients and calories intake

Key-Word Searching Software

Desktop Application that returns all the files that contain a key-word

The Great Depression

Full-stack application that emulates stock market investments
